ie.manual.entry.data_main.name: 數據
ie.manual.entry.data_main0:
當你想控制一個自動化工廠，發電廠或其他複雜的機器，你就會需要某種控制系統。
紅石是一個很好的開始，但是隨著機器越來越多，它的混亂開始顯現出來，而這正是引入數據系統的合適時機。
ie.manual.entry.data_main1: 與紅石訊號不同的是，數據是透過資料包以異步方式發送的。這意味著，訊號不是一直發送的，而是只發一次。每個資料包可以包含36個不同類型的<link;data_variable_types;§n§o變數§r;>，用26個字母和數字0-9中的一個來標記。這些資料包發送後被立即接收，使它們能夠在沒有任何數據丟失的情況下遠程傳輸。
ie.manual.entry.data_variable_types.name: 變數類型
ie.manual.entry.data_variable_types:
一個資料包可以包含多種類型的變數，每個變數都有一個預設值和其他特定於其類型的參數。
(不要對這個感到困惑：)。
基本變數類型有：, , , ，也有一些更高級的變數類型，比如： , , 和 .
ie.manual.entry.data_variable_types_null: Null是一種特殊的變數類型，它沒有值。它是未定義變數的預設類型。
ie.manual.entry.data_variable_types_int: Integer（整數）（通常簡稱為Int）是一種數字變數類型，主要用於計算和比較。
ie.manual.entry.data_variable_types_stri: String（字元串）是一種文字變數類型，它可以容納各種不同的字元。
ie.manual.entry.data_variable_types_bool: Boolean（布林值）（通常簡稱為Bool）是一種邏輯變數類型，它可以保存兩個值中的一個（真或假），並可用於邏輯函數中。
ie.manual.entry.data_variable_types_item: ItemStack是一種高級變數類型，可以保存有關特定物品（而不是物品類型）的訊息，如id、元數據（傷害）和NBT。
ie.manual.entry.data_variable_types_arra: Array（陣列）是變數的集合，變數按其索引號（從0開始）排序，它可以保存除另一個陣列之外的任何變數類型。
ie.manual.entry.data_variable_types_pair: Pair是一種變數類型，由兩種基本變數類型組成，常用於比較。
ie.manual.entry.data_variable_types_rang: Range（範圍）是一種變數類型，由兩個<link;data_variable_types_int;§o§nIntegers§r;>組成，最常用於比較數字或在某個範圍內設定數字。
ie.manual.entry.circuit_production.name: 電路板
ie.manual.entry.circuit_production0: 電路板是最重要和最常用的電子部件之一。有三種電路板：<link;circuit_production_basic;§n§o基礎電路板§r;>——使用真空管和紅石製成，<link;circuit_production_advanced;§o§n高級電路板§r;>——使用高級電子合金™ 和升級的真空管制造。最複雜的是<link;circuit_production_processor;§o§n處理器電路板§r;>，主要由矽製成，採用複雜的<link;precision_assembler;§o§n精密裝配機§r;>工藝。
ie.manual.entry.circuit_production_basic: 基礎電路板是普通的、初級的、廉價的。它們可以通過改裝來進行簡單的算術、邏輯和文字操作，但主要用途還是建造各種機器。為了生產一個基礎電路板，需要將一塊未加工的電路板放進<chemical_bath;§o§n化學浸洗器§r;>進行蝕刻，然後在上面安裝一個在<link;precission_assembler;§o§n精密裝配台§r;>中由真空管制成的晶片。
基礎電路板用於製造基礎級的電子設備和機器，如印刷機，<link;arithmetic_logic_machine;§o§n算術邏輯機§r;> 和 <link;data_input_machine;§o§n數據輸入機§r;>。
ie.manual.entry.circuit_production_advan: 高級電路板是對基礎電路的直接升級，它們仍然使用真空管，但由於使用了新的合金，它們的效能要好得多。它們是由升級的電路板和升級的真空管組成的晶片製成的。
由於其傳輸速率快，所以可以改裝來執行更高級的算術、邏輯、文字甚至物品處理操作。其傑出的速度讓它們被廣泛用於無線傳輸和高級電腦器。
ie.manual.entry.circuit_production_proce: 處理器電路板是世界上最先進、最強大的電路板，採用矽、高級電子合金和其他材料經過多步驟組裝製造而成。
目前處理器不能用於用於合成任何東西，所以造出處理器不像一個實際需要的項目，更像是一個挑戰。
ie.manual.entry.chemical_bath.name: 化學浸洗器
ie.manual.entry.chemical_bath0: 化學浸洗器是一種機器，由一個大號的浸洗缸和一個帶握爪的滑動托架構成，這台機器通常用於蝕刻未加工電路板。用錘子右擊中間的金屬板來完成建造。（譯者註：沉浸智慧暫不支持多方塊結構鏡像反轉，這也是創造模式中用投影機直接搭建的沉浸智慧多方塊結構右擊可能無法生成的原因）
ie.manual.entry.precission_assembler0: 精密裝配台是一種先進的機器，用於加工高精度的物品，它需要一個裝配方案和精密的操作機械臂。用工程師錘右擊木製鷹架來完成建造。
ie.manual.entry.precission_assembler1: 精密裝配台只使用它所需的原料，並在輸出產品的同時輸出廢料。它最常見的用途是生產電子元件。
ie.manual.entry.electrolyzer.name: 電解器
ie.manual.entry.electrolyzer0: 電解器是一種將流體電解分成兩種不同流體的機器。它能把水分解成氫和氧，把鹽水分解成氯和氫。它需要電才能運轉。請使用工程師錘右擊機器前面的重型工程塊來完成建造。
ie.manual.entry.printing_press.name: 列印機
ie.manual.entry.printing_press0: 列印機是一種印刷機器，當它收到一個資料包時，它可以按數據列印出文字。印刷機需要墨水和紙張。請使用工程師錘右擊機器前面的輕型工程塊來完成建造。
ie.manual.entry.printing_press1: 印刷紙是書籍中使用的標準紙張的一種特殊的薄版，透過在金屬衝壓機中壓製紙張製成。根據目前列印顏色的CMYK值，機器會需要不同的墨水顏色。
ie.manual.entry.printing_press2: 所需墨水取決於目前打印字元的顏色。輸出的印刷頁應立即移開，因為印刷機裡只能存放12頁紙。
ie.manual.entry.printing_press.vars_in.t: Available only when using the "text" mode
ie.manual.entry.data_input_machine.name: 數據輸入機
ie.manual.entry.data_input_machine0: 數據輸入機是一種電子設備，它由一個帶鍵盤的木桌和一個鋼製機殼組成，使用者可以在其中輸入數據並透過紅石訊號發送。在發送資料包後，變數會被保留，機器可以再次使用。這個設備需要電力。用工程師錘右擊左邊的輕型工程塊來完成建造。
ie.manual.entry.data_input_machine1: 機器的操作介面由兩部分組成。「儲存部分」用於儲存「存有數據的打點紙帶」和「數據部分」。打點紙帶可以通過插入插槽來讀取數據（如果裡面有數據的話），也可以將機器的資料包寫入其中（當打點紙帶為空白時）。在數據部分，可以使用「+」按鈕加入變數，然後可以對變數進行編輯或（按住shift鍵）刪除。當編輯
ie.manual.entry.data_input_machine2: When editing a variable, you can change it's letter by using the up and down arrows, to change it's type hold shift when clicking it.
ie.manual.entry.arithmetic_logic_machine: 算術邏輯機是一種電子設備，其主要任務是處理和修改數據。它需要電力來執行。
當在機器的左側接收到資料包時，它使用放置在機架中4個插槽中的功能電路來相應地變更變數。機器遍歷所有電路，然後按字母順序遍歷變數，並將它們的值設定為給定表達式的結果。表達式由2個值和一個運算符（+、-、*等）組成。每個迴路都有可用表達式的列表。表達式也可以有一個條件變數（布林值），
該機器還提供了一個非標準的數據類型Accessor，它本身不保存任何值，但可以從接收到的資料包中的變數取得值。透過點擊「@」按鈕，可以將表達式中的變數切換成Accessor。

算術電路
該電路用於計算加法、減法、乘法和除法等基本數學表達式。

高級算術電路
這個電路允許計算更高級的數學表達式，例如求平方、求平方根或從2個數中得到較小或較大的數字。

邏輯電路
此電路用於基本邏輯表達式（如邏輯門），如AND、OR、NOT。

比較電路
此電路允許比較兩個整數並返回布林值。

高級邏輯電路
該電路可以進行高級邏輯運算，如NAND、NOR、XOR、XNOR及基本運算。

文字處理電路 Circuit
這個電路可以做基本的文字處理，目前只允許合併兩個字元串。

物品堆棧電路
該電路可以取得和操作ItemStack數據的屬性，也可以用於取得/設定堆棧的NBT、meta和id，還可以與其他電路結合使用來控制邏輯系統。
ie.manual.entry.redstone_interface.name: 紅石介面
ie.manual.entry.redstone_interface0: 紅石介面是連接舊的紅石系統和新的數據系統的橋梁。它可以將數據從紅石訊號轉換為新的紅石訊號。因為它只是一個轉換器，所以這台機器不需要任何電力。
ie.manual.entry.redstone_interface1: 這台機器由一些線圈，一堆鋼板和幾根電子管組成，但最重要的是數據輸入埠，需要在這個埠上放置一個繼電器和一個內置的紅石接線器，你可以在上面連接一根線圈。在操作介面中有兩個部分，從數據訊號轉為紅石訊號或反之。加入條目後，必須指定變數字母和相應的紅石顏色。
ie.manual.entry.conveyor_scanner.name: 傳送帶掃描儀
ie.manual.entry.conveyor_scanner0: 傳送帶掃描儀是由傳送帶、帶特殊鏡頭的照相機和處理訊息的電子裝置組成的裝置。一個物品透過傳送帶掃描儀，它的屬性被讀取並發送到資料包內的ItemStack類型變數's'。這台機器需要消耗電力。用工程師錘右擊傳送帶來完成建造。
ie.manual.entry.conveyor_scanner.vars_ou: Scanned item (with its id, durability and NBT), process using the ItemStack circuit
ie.manual.entry.inserters.name: 物品輸入器
ie.manual.entry.inserters0: 高精度輸入設備，也稱為輸入器，用於將物品從一個地方轉移到另一個地方。物品抓取機械臂包括一個手臂和電機，用於旋轉和拾取物品。流體限流器使用管道和自動閥。抓取機械臂和流體限流器能夠從周圍任一側取得和輸入物品。
ie.manual.entry.inserters1: 可以用工程師錘右擊機械臂來設定哪邊是側面（偷偷設定輸出:D）。抓取機械臂需要電力來執行，需要數據來提供指令。
ie.manual.entry.inserters_basic: 基礎抓取機械臂用於簡單可控的物品轉移。它由基礎電路和機械零件組成，是一種可以將確定數目的物品從一個地方傳到另一個地方的既便宜又簡單的方法。
ie.manual.entry.inserters_advanced: 高級抓取機械臂是一個升級版本，它可以過濾揀選物品，並可以從礦車上拾起儲存箱和桶。高級抓取機械臂操作更快，但也會消耗更多的能量。
ie.manual.entry.inserters_fluid: 流體限流器是精確限制流體輸送量的機器。有時您只想輸入特定的流體量，此設備就可以做到這一點。
ie.manual.entry.alarm_siren.name: 警報器
ie.manual.entry.alarm_siren.subtext: 反應堆還好，至少剛剛是。
ie.manual.entry.alarm_siren0: 警報器是一種警報裝置，當提供紅石訊號時會發出很大的噪音。紅石線可以從任何一邊連接。警報器和每個紅石接線器一樣，可以重新設定為使用不同的紅石顏色通道（預設為白色）。
ie.manual.entry.programmable_speaker0: The Programmable Speaker is a device, which emits a sound when provided a redstone signal. Redstone and data wire can be attached from any side. Data can be used to set the sound and its pitch, while redstone sets the volume.
ie.manual.entry.programmable_speaker.var: ID of the sound to play
ie.manual.entry.radio_station.name: 無線電基站
ie.manual.entry.radio_station0: 無線電基站是一種無線發送和接收數據的設備。無線電台只能在距離範圍內（惡劣天氣下的射程較低）、工作頻率相同且兩個發射塔都有足夠的電能時才能進行通訊。
ie.manual.entry.radio_station1: 無線電台是一個先進的多方塊結構，它只能用工程師電動錘完成建造，並且分兩步。第一階段，建造多方塊結構，然後在上面的高級電子工程塊上使用電動錘，第二階段需要使用電動錘不斷右擊來完成建造，會消耗電動錘的能量（註：耗電量大，有電容背包的話最好帶上）。
ie.manual.entry.radio_station2: 可以使用無線電調諧器來設定電台的頻率。有2個版本的調諧器，分別具有不同的頻率範圍。電台只能使用基礎範圍。
ie.manual.entry.small_data_devices.name: 小型數據設備
ie.manual.entry.data_merger: 數據合併器是一種可以將來自側面的兩個數據輸入合併到前端進行輸出的機器。從機器的一個變數上取一個參數。每個變數也有一個側面覆蓋模式，綠色是左側，紅色是右側，如果最新的資料包不包含該變數，則較暗的顏色會刪除該變數。
ie.manual.entry.data_router:
數據路由器允許將一個資料包輸出到一個特定的麵，這個面由包的一個變數定義（可以通過使用工程師錘在路由器上進行設定）。變數必須是整數。
Top - 0
Bottom - 1
North - 2
South - 3
East - 4
West - 5
ie.manual.entry.redstone_buffer: 紅石緩衝器是一種設備，它可以保存傳入的資料包，直到它不再接收到紅石訊號為止。
ie.manual.entry.timed_buffer: 定時緩衝器是一種設備，它可以在給定的時間內傳入資料包。持續時間由變數'0'（需要等待的tick數）設定。
ie.manual.entry.small_data_buffer: 小型數據緩衝區是一種設備，最多可容納4個資料包，並在給定紅石訊號時按照先進先出的順序釋放這些資料包。
ie.manual.entry.data_wires.name: 數據布線
ie.manual.entry.data_wires0: 透過這些電線，數據會被即時發送和接收。在某些情況下，使用 <link;radio_station;§o§n無線電基站§r;> 可能更好，但電線可以在惡劣天氣下提供更好的穩定性，而且更便宜。
ie.manual.entry.data_wires1: 數據線和大多數纜線一樣，都有自己的繼電器和接線器，可以連接機器。這些可以用來建立強大的後勤、戰爭、情報和生產網路。
ie.manual.entry.tools.name: Data Wiring
ie.manual.entry.tools0: Trough the wires, data is sent and received immediately. In some cases using <link;radio_station;§o§nWireless §o§nTransmission§r;> might be better, but wires offer better stability during harsh weather and are cheaper.
ie.manual.entry.tools1: Data wires like most cabling have their own relays and connectors, which split and connect machines. These can be used to create great logistic, warfare, intelligence and production networks.
ie.manual.entry.intel_main.name: 情報
ie.manual.entry.intel_main0:
情報是工程的一個分支，專注於間諜、滲透、破壞和偵察。
情報提供多種工具和機器來觀察和預測敵人的動向。其中包括簡單的雙筒望遠鏡、先進的紅外望遠鏡和戰略指揮台。
ie.manual.entry.binoculars.name: 雙筒望遠鏡
ie.manual.entry.binoculars0: 雙筒望遠鏡是一種光學工具，可以讓人看到更遠的東西。它與 <link;railgun;§o§n磁軌槍§r;> 基於相同的放大原理。
ie.manual.entry.binoculars1: 紅外雙筒望遠鏡是普通望遠鏡的升級版。當由 <link;powerpack;§o§n電容背包§r;> 供能時可用於夜視，不要在明亮區域使用，否則可能會導致失明。
ie.manual.entry.infrared_observer.name: 紅外觀察儀
ie.manual.entry.radar.name: Radar
ie.manual.entry.radar0: Radar is the large detection device, capable of detecting entities in a direct line over incredibly long distances, including (and especially) all metal objects and artillery shells. To form it use a hammer on the left wooden scaffolding block.
ie.manual.entry.warfare_main.name: 戰爭
ie.manual.entry.warfare_main0: 戰爭是工程學的一個分支，專注於對敵人的防禦和進攻。現代工程徹底改變了作戰方式，刀劍和盾牌已經過時，投射武器的時代已經到來。現代戰爭以精確和快速的攻擊為基礎，其射程遠超以往任何武器。
ie.manual.entry.machinegun.name: 機槍
ie.manual.entry.machinegun0: 機槍是一個開拓性的發明，它可以有效地防禦各種威脅。與大多數武器不同，機槍不能隨時發射，它必須安置在一個有足夠空間的方塊上才能開火。機槍需要使用彈匣，彈匣可以在 <link;packer;§o§n封裝機§r;> 裡填充子彈。
ie.manual.entry.machinegun1: 在射擊時，彈殼會掉在地上，可以撿起回收。機槍容易過熱，過熱情況取決於射速。和大多數現代裝備一樣，機槍可以通過升級組件來實現不同的設定，比如水冷、瞄準鏡、新的雙腳架等等。
ie.manual.entry.machinegun_upgrade_heavy: 重型槍管可大大提高機槍的射擊速度，但也會增加機槍過熱。使用此升級的最佳策略是短點射。
ie.manual.entry.machinegun_upgrade_water: 水冷槍管允許在槍管下面的水箱中注入冷卻液（如水），這幾乎消除了槍管過熱的問題。用這個升級來進行火力壓制是個好主意，但是你必須以精確的頻率進行射擊才能確保壓制，因為槍的射擊速度變慢了。
ie.manual.entry.machinegun_upgrade_belt_: *尚未實現* 帶式裝彈機可以從發射位置下方的彈藥箱提供的皮帶上裝載彈藥。
ie.manual.entry.machinegun_upgrade_secon: 副彈匣升級可以在槍裡裝入兩個彈匣，第二個彈匣可以隨意裝填。
ie.manual.entry.machinegun_upgrade_hasty: 臨時雙腳架是匆忙製造的，可替代預設的雙腳架，小幅降低機槍的部署速度，同時小幅降低後坐力。
ie.manual.entry.machinegun_upgrade_preci: 精密雙腳架是預設雙腳架的替代品，高精度製造，大幅增加機槍的部署速度，同時大幅降低後坐力。
ie.manual.entry.machinegun_upgrade_scope: 機槍瞄準鏡是由 <link;railgun;§o§n磁軌槍§r;> 改裝而來的，可以放大遠程目標。
ie.manual.entry.machinegun_upgrade_infra: 紅外望遠鏡是其前身的升級版，它還可以使用紅外反射器和一個特殊的濾光片來提供夜視功能，工作時需要一個電容背包提供能量。
ie.manual.entry.machinegun_upgrade_shiel: §6Shields§r are a simple and effective way of protecting the gunner's front from projectiles and melee damage. They can resist a limited amount of projectiles, after that no damage is deflected. Shield's resistance is regenerated over time until it hasn't been broken. Attaching the upgrade also increases gun's setting up time.
ie.manual.entry.machinegun_upgrade_tripo: The §6Tripod§r is a replacement for the stock machinegun bipod. It increases the horizontal firing angle to 165 degrees and almost removes the recoil. It is heavy and slow to set up, this makes it an ideal choice for static defence.
ie.manual.entry.submachinegun_upgrade_st: The §6sturdy barrel§r is a modification, which increases the gun's accuracy and bullet velocity in cost of the gun's firing rate.
ie.manual.entry.submachinegun_upgrade_su: The §6suppressor§r makes the gunshot noises almost silent, perfect for ambushes and infiltration. It doesn't influence firing speed nor penetration.
ie.manual.entry.submachinegun_upgrade_bo: The §6bottom loader§r upgrade moves the magazine loading mechanism from the right side to the bottom, replacing the wooden foregrip. This enables both stick and drum magazines to be loaded.
ie.manual.entry.submachinegun_upgrade_fo: The §6folding stock§r makes the submachinegun more compact and decreases the aiming time. Perfect for paratroopers and special forces.
ie.manual.entry.autorevolver_upgrade_hea: The §6heavy springbox§r is an upgrade for the autorevolver. It uses mechanical power to compress the air in the bullet chamber, adding a lot of velocity to the bullets. The drawbacks are the slower reload speed and lower accuracy.
ie.manual.entry.grenade.name: 手榴彈
ie.manual.entry.grenade0: 手榴彈是一種投擲武器，含有爆炸物或其他物質，投擲後一接觸地面就會觸發。
ie.manual.entry.artillery_howitzer.name: 榴彈炮
ie.manual.entry.artillery_howitzer1: 這種精確轟炸裝置通常被稱為榴彈炮，它是一種間接火力武器，可以攻擊300個街區以外的目標。它由數據系統控制，並裝載特殊的高口徑炮彈。它最好用在進攻行動中。
ie.manual.entry.artillery_howitzer2: 榴彈炮炮台由一個混凝土掩體、一個頂部側面的指揮台和一個鋼製炮門組成，門可以透過提供紅石訊號來打開。彈藥必須從下面的傳送帶提供，並使用「裝載」指令裝載，發射後，使用「卸載」指令卸載火炮空彈殼。這台機器需要大功率才能運轉。用工程師錘右擊頂部混凝土塊來完成建造。
ie.manual.entry.artillery_howitzer.vars_:
Shell fuse time
ie.manual.entry.artillery_howitzer.vars_in.f.sub=The amount of time before the shell explodes (in ticks, 20 ticks=1 second), default is -1 (disabled)
Proper values from 0-360, but accepts any number and normalizes it
ie.manual.entry.artillery_howitzer2.vars: Possible values: from 0 (gun up) to -105 (gun down)
ie.manual.entry.artillery_howitzer3.vars: Returns whether the door is opened
Returns whether the door is closed
Returns whether the door is opening/closing
ie.manual.entry.artillery_howitzer4.vars:
Returns a shell waiting in the queue
§oRequires Integer 'i' with value 0-5§r
ie.manual.entry.ballistic_computer.name: 彈道電腦
ie.manual.entry.ballistic_computer0: 彈道電腦是一種將位置向量和子彈質量轉換為榴彈炮偏角和俯仰角的裝置。
ie.manual.entry.ballistic_computer1:
Variables input:
Integers 'x','y','z' - the position to fire onto
Integer 'm' - the bullet's mass
Variables output:
Integer 'p' - the pitch rotation of the gun
Integer 'y' - the yaw rotation of the gun
ie.manual.entry.ballistic_computer.vars_: Relative to the center of the artillery
Because you can't input a Float, you have to round the number
Proper values from 0-360, but accepts any number and normalizes it
Possible values: from 0 (gun up) to -105 (gun down)
ie.manual.entry.ammocrate.name: 彈藥箱
ie.manual.entry.ammocrate0: 彈藥箱是一個攜帶式的儲存所有子彈和空彈殼的地方。還可以裝載一個左輪手槍或一個快速裝彈器。空手右擊可從儲物箱裡取出左輪手槍。
ie.manual.entry.chemdispenser.name: 化學噴灑機
ie.manual.entry.chemdispenser0: 由設計電動錘的同一位工程師發明的一種裝置，最初是用來澆灌莊稼和滅火的，也可以用來精確地噴灑燃燒液體。
ie.manual.entry.chemdispenser1: 化學噴灑機需要透過一根電線連接到裝置的連接器，一個數據訊號（或一個恆定的紅石訊號）來決定它的行為，液體從背面的輸入端輸入。
ie.manual.entry.ammunition_factory.name: 彈藥廠
ie.manual.entry.ammunition_factory0: 彈藥廠是一個重型的多分部機器，生產各種類型的彈藥。你可以在這裡生產手榴彈，子彈和炮彈，它們的效果取決於使用的材料。
ie.manual.entry.ammunition_factory1:
這台機器需要一個電源，可以給它一個可選的數據訊號來改變子彈的引信時間、顏色和名稱。彈藥的基本成分是：
彈芯，由金屬製成，如鋼或黃銅
成分-爆炸性材料、曳光粉、燃燒藥、煙火等。
火藥-用量取決於彈藥的口徑。
口徑越大，部件的容積越大，質量也就越大。
ie.manual.entry.ammunition_factory2: 在製作子彈時，請記住：沒有所謂的「最好的子彈成分」，加入與你需求相符的成分即可。需要閃光彈？那就用煙火。需要能貫穿鋼槽的子彈？那就用鈾芯。但請記住，這兩個結合將導致彈芯影響煙火的閃光效果。一些材料如黃銅可以提高閃光效果，而一些材料如鎢、鋼或鈾會使其降低。
ie.manual.entry.ammunition_factory3: 使用數據系統為子彈命名和著色，以便你區分它們，這樣你就不會把穿甲彈誤認為是高爆彈。著色需要向箱裡加入墨水，就像 <link;printing_press;§o§n列印機§r;>.
ie.manual.entry.ammunition_factory4:
Variables:
Integer 'p'-percentage proportion of the bullet components (0-100)
Integer or String 'c'-bullet casing's colour (Int - RGB, String - Hex)
String 'n' - bullet name.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_cores.name: Bullet Cores
ie.manual.entry.bullet_core.core_brass.d: Brass is a heavy metal with bad penetration capabilities, but it greatly increases the effect of other components.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_core.core_lead.de: Lead is a good material for cheap bullets with high damage and mediocre penetrating power.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_core.core_steel.d: Using steel is a non-expensive way to increase the penetration capabilties of the projectiles, only disadvantage is slightly decreased component effect.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_core.core_tungste: Tungsten is a better at penetrating objects than steel, but it decreases the effect of other components
ie.manual.entry.bullet_core.core_uranium: What do you mean, ammo is depleted?
Low weight and hardness make uranium a great penetrator without loosing capability to carry explosive materials. Great, but expensive choice.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_components.name: Bullet Components
ie.manual.entry.bullet_component.firewor: Fireworks, while mostly known for their beautiful looks, can be used to suppress and blind enemies.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_component.tracer_: Tracers are a good way to see which way your bullet flies, this can be used for purely decorative purposes or for correcting a gun's shot angle.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_component.flare_p: Flares can be used for illuminating or marking positions, this can be useful in directing artillery
ie.manual.entry.bullet_component.nuke.de: Nuclear Explosives are the most powerful and destructive known to man, only thick layers of reinforced concrete can protect against its force. Moreover, heat caused by it melts down enemies around and even if they survive that, they will die of radiation quickly.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_component.tnt.des: TNT is an explosive material with mediocre destructive power. Because of how easy it is to produce, it is a good choice for machinegun bullets and grenades.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_component.rdx.lor: Things go up, things go down!
ie.manual.entry.bullet_component.rdx.des: RDX, also known as the §shexogen§r is a powerful high-explosive material. Being twice as powerful as TNT, it's able to destroy even the heaviest emplacements.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_component.hmx.des: HMX is one of the most powerful conventional explosives, it's three times more powerful than TNT it's capable of breaching trough any fortifications.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_component.white_p: White phosphorus is the main ingredient of most incendiary shells. Its high heat makes surrounding enemies more flammable, while the burning hot fragments ignite everything around.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_component.shrapne: Amelinium, one does not simply paint it
Aluminum is not the best material for shrapnel, but it's cheap enough to be mass used in combat.
Zinc is not a good shrapnel material, but when there are shortages, anything will do.
While throwing copper at the enemies won't bribe them, after a few shots it might make them dead.
Choosing Platinum? Yes, definitely, make yourself poor, you want it, not me.
Ah yes, the good old way of wasting money - war. While the bullets are somewhat expensive, they don't seem to have much effect on the opponent.
Nickel is a bad choice for shrapnel, it doesn't deal much damage, but in hard times it can save the day.
Toss a coin to your gunner
Silver shrapnel is a good option for combating undead enemies, the shrapnel deals more damage to them and slows them down.
Electrum excels at conducting electricity, while the shapnel won't hurt much, enemies hit will receive more damage from energy weapons, such as tesla coils.
Whatever the weather, we kill enemies together.
Constantan is well known for its heat conductive properties, enemies hit will be prone to fire damage for some time.
Iron is a good choice for shrapnel, it easily penetrates enemies wearing light armor.
Lead is a good shrapnel material, it's heavy and inflicts high damage on unarmored enemies.
The fullmetal in all its glory
Steel is a fine shrapnel material, good damage, scatter and speed make it effective against all opponents.
Brass is a bad choice for making shrapnel, although its high weight makes it deal more damage than other weak metals.
Tungsten is a very good material for shrapnel, its high damage allows to shred enemies to pieces.
Graphite is a very good shrapnel material, its low weight and high piercing capabilities make it useful in combat.
Uranium is one of the best materials for shrapnel, the scattering fragments have no problem piercing trough armor and can deal high damage to any target.
ie.manual.entry.logistics.name: 物流
ie.manual.entry.logistics0: 物流是一個獨特的工程分支，專注於儲存、傳輸和管理貨物轉移。一個好的物流系統包括一個倉庫和附近的生產廠、工廠，以便快速製造所需的東西。有了最新的電子電氣技術和一些老式的旋轉機械，創造一個好的輸送系統比以往任何時候都容易。
ie.manual.entry.packer.name: 封裝機
ie.manual.entry.packer0: 封裝機用於批量將物品裝載到儲存箱或彈藥箱。它需要電源和一個單獨的數據訊號來定義每次應該放多少東西。用工程師右擊傳送帶上方的管道來完成建造。
ie.manual.entry.packer1: 包裝機從側面接收要包裝的物品，並將封裝後的儲物箱放在底部傳送帶上。
ie.manual.entry.skycrates.name: 索道
ie.manual.entry.skycrates0: 索道系統是傳輸物品的獨特方法。它的速度比任何傳送帶都優越，而且用麻繩做成的線更便宜，更節省空間。它也有一些缺點：需要兩邊都有索道站，而且儲存箱需要放入礦車。在較長距離上，索道比傳送帶更好，不鼓勵在短距離（0-30米）使用。
ie.manual.entry.skycrates1: 索道站是索道的起點和終點。在中間的鷹架上使用工程師錘來完成建造。需要輸入旋轉動力到它的側面才能執行。齒輪的數量可增加其效率，效果類似於 <link;rotary_power3;§o§n齒輪箱§r;>。
ie.manual.entry.skycrates2: 索道站使用載架來將儲存箱掛上索道，所以需要在抓取機械臂（在後面，可能有點不起眼）後面放一個裝有載架的儲物箱，抓取機械臂會自動將其取出使用。礦車只有在關卡豎起時才能進入索道站，並在索道站裝卸好儲存箱後自動駛出。輸入紅石訊號可以強制讓礦車駛出車站。
ie.manual.entry.skycrates3: 索道中繼點是索道兩點之間的中繼。它只能連接兩根索道。用工程師錘右擊柵欄來完成建造。（譯者註：必須從中繼點的背面點擊柵欄）
ie.manual.entry.skycrates4: 儲存箱礦車是透過索道運輸物品的安全方式。可以把一個儲存箱放入礦車，裡面的物品不會丟失。可拆分成礦車和儲存箱。
ie.manual.entry.skycrates5: 索道載架用於透過滑索運輸板條箱，有兩種型號：基礎型和電動型，電動型使用經過的 <link;tesla_coil;§o§n特斯拉線圈§r;> 所提供的能量。
ie.manual.entry.skycrates6: Crate minecarts are a safe way to transport items via rail. They can be crafted by putting a crate into a minecart, items inside won't be lost. When disassembled, the minecart splits into the actual cart and the crate.
ie.manual.entry.skycrates7: The skycrate mounts are used to transport crates via the zipline, there are two models: the basic one and the electric one, which uses energy provided on the go by <link;tesla_coil;§o§nTesla §o§nCoils§r;> nearby.
ie.manual.entry.sawmill.name: 鋸床
ie.manual.entry.sawmill0: 鋸床是一種由旋轉動力驅動的木工機器，由一個桌子，一個機械插入器和鋸架組成。要完成搭建，請用工程師錘右擊中間的木製鷹架。
ie.manual.entry.sawmill1: 可以安裝不同材料製成的鋸。雖然每一把鋸子都能有效地切割木材，但用鋼和鎢等硬質材料製成的鋸還可以切割金屬。
ie.manual.entry.sawmill2: 這台機器需要一個穩定的旋轉動力供給。物品可以從桌子的右側輸入，加工好的物品會輸出到地面上的木製儲物箱
ie.manual.entry.rotary_power.name: 旋轉動力
ie.manual.entry.rotary_power0: 旋轉動力是一種老式的電力替代品。用輪子和馬達皮帶代替電線和連接器，動力系統包括2個參數：扭矩-單位為牛頓米（Nm）和轉速-單位為轉/分鐘（RPM）。機器需要不同的扭矩和轉速才能有效工作。
ie.manual.entry.rotary_power1: 如果這些值中的任何一個超過限制，機器就會爆炸。動力可以透過 <link;rotary_power3;§o§n齒輪箱§r;> 來合併或分離。
ie.manual.entry.rotary_power2: 傳動輪可用於在設備之間傳遞機械（旋轉）動力。放置後，可以使用傳動帶將其連接到另一個傳動輪上，這與用電線連接繼電器的方式相同。
ie.manual.entry.rotary_power3: 傳動帶是每個旋轉動力系統的主要傳動部件。它們的大小和傳遞的速度有所不同。如果傳動帶的扭矩或轉速 太高，它就會從傳動輪上脫落掉在地上。可以根據不同的需要使用不同的材料-鋼能承受更高的轉矩，但功率損耗也更高。
ie.manual.entry.rotary_power4: 齒輪箱用來連接多個傳動輪，他們的側面可以設定為輸入，輸出或空。所有輸入的輸入轉矩相加，然後在所有輸出之間平均分配。您可以使用齒輪箱合併扭矩，使其更高，或在2個或以上傳動輪之間分配扭矩。齒輪箱要求齒輪具有一定的承受扭矩和轉速的能力來以滿功率執行。
ie.manual.entry.rotary_power5: 變速箱用於連接使用不同軸的機械設備，它們也可以將風車或水車連接到傳動帶網或向發電機輸出機械能。
ie.manual.entry.rotary_power6: 扳手和電動扳手可用於打開機械裝置的艙口，以便進行維護，例如在齒輪箱中更換齒輪。
death.attack.iiBulletHeadShot: %1$s took a %2$s's bullet to their head
death.attack.iiBulletHeadShotNoShooter: %1$s took a bullet to their head
death.attack.iiMotorbikeExplicit: %2$s has made %1$s's ass his free parking spot
death.attack.iiMotorbikeSuicide: %1$s decided to jump off a moving motorcycle
death.attack.iiPanzer1: %1$s was crushed under the Panzer's threads
death.attack.iiPanzer2: The indomitable Panzer's threads have pulverized %1$s

desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.i: Allows nightvision and magnification, requires energy to operate.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.t: Displays tooltips, which normally require a hammer, a voltmeter or a wrench to be held, requires energy to operate.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.e: Combines the effects of Infiltrator's and Technician's headgears into one device. Increased energy consumption.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.s: Slightly increase armor thickness. Can deflect arrows and other light projectiles. Up to 3 can be installed per one armor piece.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.c: Significantly increase armor thickness. Deflects projectiles and damages enemy melee weapons when they aren't capable of dealing enough damage to armor wearer. Up to 3 can be installed per one armor piece.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.h: Makes the armor resistant to radiation and corrosion.
When combined with reinforced boots, allows for swimming in hot liquids.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.a: Makes wearer immune to electric damage and makes proximity fuses unable to target it. Sensitive to EMP.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.c: Makes wearer invisible when sneaking through foliage. Sensitive to fire.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.i: Makes wearer invisible to infrared-based devices. Sensitive to EMP.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.s: Can be filled with oxygen for breathing underwater and additional fuel for operating powered tools.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.h: Allows slow, albeit stable flight. Requires gasoline.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.e: Allows faster running. Requires energy to operate.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.b: Makes wearer immune to fire damage. When combined with Heat-Resistant Coating, allows the wearer to swim in hot liquids.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.s: Increases walk speed on snow and stability on ice.
desc.immersiveintelligence.toolupgrade.i: Protects wearer from falling damage. Silences wearer's steps.

skin.immersiveintelligence.anno_1880.tex: Rewarded to BluSunrize and Hazard for their great work on Immersive Engineering.
skin.immersiveintelligence.royal.text: An retrofuturistic imperial skin. Originally meant to be a skin for the Patreons, now granted as a reward for contribution.
skin.immersiveintelligence.old_glory.tex: A Poland themed skin, granted as a reward for contribution.
skin.immersiveintelligence.vaterland.tex: A Germany themed skin, granted as a reward for contribution.
skin.immersiveintelligence.pershing.text: A Western Allies themed skin, granted as a reward for contribution.
skin.immersiveintelligence.zvezda.text: A Soviet themed skin, granted as a reward for contribution.
skin.immersiveintelligence.stormwind.tex: A skin inspired by the old awesome flash game "Storm Winds"
skin.immersiveintelligence.flakmeister.t: A skin granted to Carver, who contributed a lot and howitzized a bit more.
skin.immersiveintelligence.blackdragon.t: A skin granted to Blackdragon, who made great II tutorial videos on YouTube.
skin.immersiveintelligence.eisenheim.tex: A skin themed with Engineer faction of the upcoming Engineered Adventures: Tales from the Front modpack.
skin.immersiveintelligence.vanguard.text: A skin rewarded for donating $1 or more on Patreon.
skin.immersiveintelligence.magnate.text: A skin rewarded for donating $5 or more on Patreon.
skin.immersiveintelligence.investor.text: A skin rewarded for donating $15 on Patreon.
machineupgrade.immersiveintelligence.mg_: Expanding the ammo compartments allows to feed bullets directly to a machinegun after some modifications. Crate must be open to provide ammunition.
machineupgrade.immersiveintelligence.emp: When emplacement's weapon is heavily damaged, smoke will be discharged to provide cover.
Higher quality bearings increase the maximum weapon rotation speed, to work at full capacity lubrication is required
machineupgrade.immersiveintelligence.mg_: The heavy barrels allow for much faster firing rate and slightly increase the maximum permitted overheat.
A replacement for the stock barrels. When mounted, barrels do not overheat when a coolant is provided.
Placing additional sandbags around the machinegun nest gives it additional armor and increases its durability.
machineupgrade.immersiveintelligence.cor: Equipping the Projectile Workshop with an inserter allows precise filling of the projectiles with desired components.
machineupgrade.immersiveintelligence.unp: Reverses the function of the machine so it can unload items from containers and drain liquids and power from containers (requires additional upgrades)
machineupgrade.immersiveintelligence.pac: Installing a fluid tank allows to fill items with liquids, decreases item storage space by half, due to safety reasons a Charging Module cannot be installed along with this upgrade
Installing a fluid tank allows to charge items with IF, decreases item storage space by half, due to safety reasons a Pump Module cannot be installed along with this upgrade
desc.immersiveintelligence.variable_send: Sends the current packet to data network
ie.manual.category.ii_motorworks.name: Motorworks
ie.manual.entry.data_variable_types_inte: Integer (often shortened to Int) is a number variable type, mainly used in calculations and number comparisons.
ie.manual.entry.data_variable_types_bool: Boolean (often shortened to Bool) is a logic variable type, it can hold one of two values - True or False and can be used in logic functions.
ie.manual.entry.electrolyzer1: The fluid has to be provided to the side of the machine, after the process is finishes the two created fluids will be outputted to the front. Although the machine's internal tanks allow storing small amount of the liquid, consider construction of <link;tank;§o§nproper §o§ntanks§r;> for an industrial-scale electrolysis.
ie.manual.entry.filler.name: Filler
ie.manual.entry.filler0: The filler is a device used to fill containers with dust. It's most important purpose is filling bullet casings with gunpowder. To form the filler, use a hammer on the middle conveyor block.
ie.manual.entry.filler1: To operate the filler requires electricity, a container to fill and an appropriate amount of dust. When dust is placed into the input slot it is moved to the main tank, the total amount of dust stored there is shown in mB. The machine can store only one dust type at a time. Only way to remove dust from the machine, except filling containers is to break the machine.
ie.manual.entry.chemical_painter.name: Chemical Painter
ie.manual.entry.chemical_painter0: The Chemical Painter is a machine used to paint items in a precisely set color using ink. To form it, use a hammer on the middle light engineering block.
ie.manual.entry.chemical_painter1: Painting items manually is tedious and not very precise, a lot of dye can be wasted on just trying to get the wanted color. Chemical Painter eliminates this problem. Cyan, Magenta, Yellow and Black Ink have to be provided to four fluid input slots on the back of the device. Electricity has to be provided trough the top input port. Items can be inserted manually or trough the inward facing conveyor.
ie.manual.entry.chemical_painter2:
To set the color use the interface or data system. In the interface there are 3 buttons, which allow switching the color model: R- RGB, C -CMYK and H - HSV.
The chemical painter can be used to paint bullets to mark their purpose. Remember that most items can be cleaned using .
ie.manual.entry.chemical_painter.vars_ca: Returns currently used color as a RGB integer
Returns currently used color as a hex string
ie.manual.entry.conveyor_scanner1:
To operate, the machine requires electricity. To form it use a hammer on the conveyor facing the same direction as you.
The Scanning Conveyor is not very capable on its own, to process the signal you can use an ALM with the proper circuit. It is most commonly used as a part of an item counter or a trigger, activated by a specific item.
Optional. ItemStack or OreDict String the items have to match.
Optional. After what amount of items should the task (request) end.
Optional. Max amount of items the inserter will take per turn.
ie.manual.entry.programmable_speaker.var: If true, sound is played once, regardless of redstone signal
ie.manual.entry.tripod_periscope.name: Tripod Periscope
ie.manual.entry.tripod_periscope0: Tripod periscope is an observation device consisting of a pair of binoculars, magnifying tubes, a rotation mechanism and a tripod. The Tripod Periscope allows peeking out of a trench, or a wall without the risk of getting shot.
ie.manual.entry.tripod_periscope1:
Compared to the standard Binoculars, Tripod Periscope has superior zoom capabilities, allowing one to scout further and see objects at extremely far distances.
Deployment of the Tripod is similar to that of a Machinegun, requiring you to place the item down on the ground and then interact with it while having an empty hand. To pick it up, sneak and interact with it.
ie.manual.entry.radar1:
Radar has multiple uses. It can be linked with emplacement weapons, such as the CPDS and used to intercept projectiles at long ranges. It can also be linked with the Strategic Command Table [WIP].
If upgraded with §6Triangulators§r, the radar can also detect radio signals within its range and determine their location, this allows ambushing unsuspecting enemies with precise artillery strikes. In order to operate the Radar requires a constant supply of electricity.
ie.manual.entry.contributor_skins.name: Contributor Skins
ie.manual.entry.contributor_skins:
Contributors of Immersive Intelligence, whether trough direct help by providing assets, code, translations, recording tutorial videos, donations trough Patreon or simply contributing to II community can not be overlooked and have to be rewarded.
For that, a collection of skins has been added to the game, these are applicable to various weapons, ranging from machineguns to howitzers. Huge thanks to all of you, without you this project would take much longer than Soon™.
ie.manual.entry.submachinegun.name: Submachinegun
ie.manual.entry.submachinegun0: The Submachinegun, often referred to as the §sSMG§r, is an infantry weapon designed for close-to-medium range engagements. The submachinegun is relatively cheap to manufacture and produce ammo for, making it an ideal choice for close combat, which requires fast-paced maneuvers and high rate of fire.
ie.manual.entry.submachinegun1: SMG can be modified to accept drum magazines and can have a <link;revolver;§o§nbayonet§r;3> attached to it, enabling melee during close range engagements. To improve aiming speed a <link;submachinegun;§o§nfolding §o§nstock§r;6> can be installed. To eliminate the loud gunshot noises, which can attract enemies around, a <link;submachinegun;§o§nsuppressor§r;4> upgrade can be installed. On the opposite, the barrel can be exchanged for a noisier, but higher-velocity (and because of that - better penetration) <link;submachinegun;§o§nsturdy §o§nbarrel§r;3>.
ie.manual.entry.submachinegun2: Keep in mind the Submachinegun loses its accuracy with the distance to the target. It is advised to use Railguns or Artillery Weapons long range engagements instead.
ie.manual.entry.mortar.name: Mortar
ie.manual.entry.mortar0: The Mortar is a light, mobile, indirect weapon for close range fire support. The Mortar has the lowest range of all the artillery weapons. However, it is compensated by its ease of deployment and exceptional mobility.
ie.manual.entry.mortar1: In order to operate a Mortar, the artilleryman has to place it on the ground, facing the direction of the enemy, and then use the weapon. Mortar operator cannot change the horizontal direction easily, can change the vertical angle by pressing Forward or Backward. The mortar comes with short-range artillery sights built in, available by holding 'Z'. To fire a projectile, the operator has to use a mortar shell held in their hand while manning the mortar.
ie.manual.entry.grenades.name: Grenades
ie.manual.entry.grenades0: The stick-hand-grenade is a thrown weapon that contains explosives or other material that triggers on contact. To assemble it, combine a treated stick with the appropriate grenade core in the <link;ammunition_assembler;§o§nAmmunition §o§nAssembler§r;>.
ie.manual.entry.grenades1: Railgun grenades are ammunition for the Railgun and Heavy Railgun, which can be used instead of the standard metal rods. They can be filled with explosives or shrapnel and then be used as a portable artillery weapon. To assemble it, combine an aluminum rod with the appropriate grenade core in the <link;ammunition_assembler;§o§nAmmunition§o §nAssembler§r;>.
ie.manual.entry.explosives_mines.name: Mines and Explosives
ie.manual.entry.explosives_mines_satchel: When your operations require a stealthy, precise approach, radio-detonated satchel charges are the right choice. Be it mining operations, demolition of buildings or sabotage of train bridges, satchel charges are universal in their role and are beloved by both combat engineers and saboteurs.

The primary way to detonate the explosives is by using a <link;radio_station;§o§nradio§o§nsignal§r;>. To do that, the explosives must first be programmed with a data packet in a <link;data_input_machine;§o§nData §o§nInput §o§nMachine§r;>. Explosives will only detonate when they receive a data packet identical to the programmed one through radio. Additionally, explosives can receive data through cable on the exact same conditions and work as a data relay.
Explosives can also be detonated using redstone, similar to other redstone connectors they can receive signal on one of the 16 channels. To change the channel sneak-use a hammer on a placed satchel.

Unlike other explosive casings, the radio explosives satchel has to be crafted. The leather satchel might seem expensive at first, but keep in mind the leather can be artificially produced using some <link;sawmill;§o§nsawdust§r;> and <link;cokeoven;§o§ncreosote§r;>.
ie.manual.entry.explosives_mines0:
Mines are commonly used as a static defensive measure. Their main use cases are denying the enemy access to an area, slowing their advance or in case they aren’t very bright - marking where their graves will be.
Keep in mind landmines do not differentiate between their targets, it is very important to keep a track of your own minefields and use plans instead of placing them randomly.
ie.manual.entry.explosives_mines_landmin: Classic, reliable and cheap to produce: this type of landmines is the most widely used one. The way it works is very straightforward: it explodes after an enemy steps onto it, causing serious damage. However, dropped items and lightweight critters like chickens will not cause a detonation.

A prominent feature of the landmine is the ability to dig it into any soft block, such as dirt, gravel and clay on which it was placed. In order to dig the landmine into the ground, use a shovel on it. Although any shovel would suffice, the trench shovel does that job much faster.
Additionally, you can place grass on top of the landmine to fully conceal it.
ie.manual.entry.explosives_mines_tripmin: Tripmine, sometimes called the §sjumping landmine§r is an explosive device, activated not by weight pressure, but by pulling the wire on the top. After being triggered, the mine will jump out of its casing and explode. In order to be set up, the mine requires linking with another mine or a tripwire connector. It is possible to dig the tripmine into the ground with a shovel, the same as the regular landmine.
ie.manual.entry.explosives_mines_naval_m: Naval Mines are mines deployed in water, which prevent boats and water creatures from reaching an area, effectively killing them on contact. Naval mines carry a higher amount of components inside, meaning the explosion is greater than one of a landmine and deadly in most of the cases.

In order to deploy the Navy mine, first set the chain length by sneaking and scrolling, this will determine. When that’s done, use the landmine on a water block, it will deploy an anchor cart with the mine attached to it with a chain. The cart will try to submerge, but the mine will try to stay afloat until it reaches maximum chain length or the surface.
Take note, that Naval Mines take a few seconds to arm themselves, meaning you can safely deploy them without the risk of blowing yourself up.
ie.manual.entry.explosives_mines_sign:
While being a simple piece of wood with text written on it, this sign seems to instill some sense of dread in your adversaries.
Its main purpose is designating friendly and hostile minefields, although some use it as a bedroom decoration for some reason. Well, such are Engineers…
ie.manual.entry.light_engineer_armor0: The Light Engineer Armor is a lightweight, stylish, yet very protective suit. Although made of leather and steel, due to the precision with which it was made, it protects against any adversaries you might encounter better than steel and diamond armors. It is a must-have for every Combat Engineer.
ie.manual.entry.light_engineer_armor1: Designed with being multi-purpose in mind, the Light Engineer Armor can be adapted to the environment using the Module System™. The armor is modular and allows addition of upgrades, ranging from metal plates to strengthen it, exoskeleton for increased running speed and infrared headgear allowing night vision to flippers and snow rackets which grant superior mobility.
ie.manual.entry.light_engineer_armor_upg: The Gas Mask is a an upgrade which protects the user from hazardous gasses. When combined with scuba tank, the mask allows breathing underwater.

The Infiltrator's Headgear is an advanced tool made for espionage. The headgear allows magnifying the image and emits infrared light, allowing night vision. It can be combined with the Technician's Headgear to create the Engineer's Headgear.

The Technician's Headgear is a useful tool for managing factories. It displays information such as energy contained in machines, rotary power statistics, stored fluids and data. It can be combined with the Infiltrator's Headgear to create the Engineer's Headgear.

The Engineer's Headgear combines the effects of Infiltrator's and Technician's headgears into one device. As a result, the power consumption is increased, but so is the amount of features.
Only thing it lacks now is a can holder.

The Steel Armor Plates increase the armor thickness and durability and provide an ability to deflect arrows and other light projectiles. About time to show off the world that industrial progress already outmatched the obsolete bows and arrows! Due to their weight only 3 plates can be installed per one armor piece.

Composite Armor Plates are much more durable than Steel Ones and due to their light weight, a higher thickness can be achieved. In addition, hitting the armor with a melee weapon will damage it severely. Only 3 plates can be installed per one armor piece.
The Hazmat Coating is an additional internal armor layer protecting from radiation and acids. Time to go for a walk in the nuclear wastelands.

The Heat Resistance Coating layer allows to swim in hot liquids which would otherwise incinerate the wearer. Only works when worn with reinforced boots due to overlapping protective layers and heat distribution.

The Anti-Static Mesh gives the user immunity against electrical damage. It also interferes with the proximity fuses targeting, disrupting them. However, due to the properties of such coating it is extra vulnerable to any electromagnetic weapons, causing greater harm than it would have otherwise.

The Camouflage Mesh is a simple net with leaves attached to it, making the wearer blend in with foliage when sneaking.  Due to it being made from leaves, being lit on fire is not recommended. Especially useful in forests, gardens and plains.

The Infrared-Absorbing Mesh absorbs infrared light cast into it, serving as a perfect way to hide from infrared sensors. However due to it’s construction, getting hit by electromagnetic weapons will cause more harm than usual.

The Scuba Tank gives the ability to remain longer underwater with no need to resurface for new air reserves. Thanks to it’s feed structure, can be filled with some fuel for operating powered tools.
Comes especially handy during underwater construction works. Requires a Gas Mask to be worn.

The Exoskeleton upgrade grants it’s user ability to run faster thanks to it’s complex set of motors and hydraulics. As a safety precaution, it is only activated when running. The exoskeleton requires energy to operate.
The Boots Reinforcement upgrade consists of several steel plates, held together by leather straps. It adds additional armor and protects the wearer from fire.
Flippers allow swift movement in fluids. They work very well with the Scuba Tank and Gasmask.
Snow Rackets improve stability on snow and ice, enabling the wearer to cross through difficult terrain.
Internal Springs suppress the impact force, protecting the wearer from fall damage. This is combined with rubber sole pads, which make the steps almost silent.
ie.manual.entry.trench_shovel.name: Trench Shovel
ie.manual.entry.trench_shovel0: While commonly overlooked by most when it comes to choosing tools, Trench Shovel is one of the important pieces of equipment in an Engineer’s arsenal. Compared to regular shovels, the trench variant is more compact and sharpened, and packs a bigger punch as the result. Due to its design, it allows burying the <link;explosives_mines;§o§nlandmines§r;> into the ground much 3 times faster than a regular shovel.
ie.manual.entry.mine_detector.name: Mine Detector
ie.manual.entry.mine_detector: A mine detector is a tool designed for detecting landmines and concealed explosive devices. It originates from an unsuccessful attempt to create an ore detector, but turned out to be a savior tool for the military.
ie.manual.entry.mine_detector_demining0:
In order to check for the landmine, you have to hold the Mine Detector in your main hand, and point it at a block. The presence of the landmine is indicated by a beep noise, growing in frequency the closer you are to the landmine.
It is also worth noting that the mine detection happens not at your position, but at the one you’re looking at.
ie.manual.entry.mine_detector_demining1: To disarm the <link;explosives_mines;§o§nmine §o§nor §o§nexplosive§r;> after a successful detection, use the wire cutters or their electric counterpart. When that's done, you can safely break the block.
ie.manual.entry.flagpole.name: Flagpole
ie.manual.entry.flagpole0: The flagpole is a multiblock which allows to mark nearby territory, keep it loaded and under control, while also displaying a stylish banner for friends and foes to recognise. To form it use a hammer on the middle razor wire block.
ie.manual.entry.flagpole1:
The flagpole keeps 8 surrounding chunks loaded along with the one it's placed in, it does not require any resources to do so.
Its another function is a display for banners in form of a flag. To place a banner use it on one of the wooden pole blocks. If you have decided to invade someone else's property or just want to update your banner design, you can remove the placed banner by using wire cutters.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement.name: Emplacement
ie.manual.entry.emplacement0: The Emplacement is a heavy defensive structure used for protecting the perimeter of your factory. To form it use a hammer on the upper middle sandbag block.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement1: Compared to the traditional Gun Turret, setting up an Emplacement requires much more preparation. Emplacements do not have a <link;emplacement_weapons;§o§nweapon§r;> installed by default. Instead, the weapon is assembled on the emplacement using the Wrench or its Electric Equivalent. Upon interacting with emplacement with a wrench, you have a selection of modules to install, each requiring their own share of resources to be built. After you select the weapon of choice, you need to assemble it by further interacting with the emplacement using the Wrench. Note, the Electric Wrench assembles the weapon much faster.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement2: The emplacement requires electricity, ammunition and by default a redstone signal in order to operate. If the redstone signal is cut off, the weapon will hide inside the emplacement.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement3:
Emplacement weapons can be damaged and automatically repaired. You can set up the minimal threshold of the emplacement weapon’s health before it goes into repair state.
During repair, it will hide inside the Emplacement and will not react to commands. Note that Emplacements can be destroyed if enough damage is inflicted to the gun itself, which also means that you will lose resources used to construct it.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement4: Emplacements allow storing up to 4 target filtering tasks. Each task has 3 basic groups on which it filters the entity. The first one is the Type: a mob, animal, vehicle or shell, additional parameters (id) can be specified. The second is a name and the third is a team. The parameters within a group are joined using OR and then AND with other groups. For example: select all mobs or animals from team “a” and “b” with name “c”.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement5: *Immersive Intelligence™ is not liable for any property damage or death inflicted by incorrect targeting inputs.*
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_weapons.name: Emplacement Weapons
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_mg0: Machinegun Emplacement is the most basic and cheapest of all the Emplacements available. It is a reliable choice for dealing with soft ground targets, or light vehicles, when using armor-piercing ammunition.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_mg1:
The Machinegun Emplacement comes in 3 variants: Default, Heavy Barreled and Water-Cooled, which are identical in function to those present in the infantry version of the Machinegun.
Take note, this weapon does not use magazines, bullets have to be provided through the emplacement input port. Due to its limited pitch the MG Emplacement is a poor choice for firing at air targets.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_heavy_chem0: Heavy Chemthrower is a weapon designed for close-range engagements against massed enemies. Similarly to regular Chemthrower, the heavy variant can be filled with various liquids from the liquid tanks.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_heavy_chem1: By default it ignites the fluid, but it can be toggled using a data packet. The Heavy Chemthrower Emplacement has the lowest range among all of the Emplacements, and is bad at targeting airborne targets.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_flak0: The Autocannon Emplacement is a standard, all-rounder option for dealing with soft targets, vehicles and air targets. Depending on the ammo, it can serve as a great standard option for base protection against all sorts of threats.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_flak1:
Due to its high velocity and diverse pitch and yaw ranges, the Autocannon is especially effective against airborne targets.
Its drawbacks are a slower rate of fire compared to MG and it’s relatively low magazine size, forcing it to reload very often. It is best to combine it with other emplacements.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_heavy_railgu: Heavy Railgun Emplacement is used in precision dependent long range combat. It is best used against vehicles and single targets with high durability. Damage is dependent on the metal out of which the rod is made, or composition of the railgun grenade.

Due to it’s very low fire rate, turn rate, and low magazine count, it is a poor choice for engaging amassed targets. It is required to be paired with other emplacements for better protection.
The Heavy Railgun possesses a high armor-piercing capability, it is best utilized on armored targets, vehicles and targets behind steel walls. No armor is too tough.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_cpds0: A pinnacle of computer technology, mechanical skill and sophisticated targeting software, the Counter-Projectile Defense System is the worst enemy of anything that can fly and the logistics department.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_cpds1:
Due to it’s astounding rate of fire, as well as fast tracking and response abilities,makes it almost impossible for air targets to evade.
Thanks to its advanced targeting system it is the best gun for anti-projectile defense purposes, with the capability to shoot down artillery projectiles in mid air with a storm of bullets. In order to do that it needs to be linked to a Radar or Observers in order to maximize the chances of successful interception.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_cpds2: The only drawback it comes with is its enormous maintenance cost, due to its high rate of fire. If you’re struggling with providing it with sufficient amounts of ammunition, consider using it as a special, last resort weapon for countering projectiles.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_tesla0: The Tesla Coil Emplacement is the bigger and more refined variant of the Tesla Coil. The weapon is a good choice against soft targets, who happened to come too close. Thanks to its advanced systems, the weapon can differentiate between friend and foe and deals higher damage in expanded range.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_tesla1: Due to being energy-powered, it does not require ammunition - only a constant supply of electricity. Its drawbacks are a low range of attack and high energy consumption.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_ir_observer0: The Infrared Observer is a surveillance device used to detect enemies from afar and share their coordinates with other emplacements. It is considered one of the most, if not the most important emplacement weapon.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_ir_observer1: Using IR Observers, one can dramatically extend the operational range of the other Emplacements, reveal and communicate enemy positions coordinates via Data on extremely long distances and coordinate a network of connected Emplacements to perform precision focus fire on one target from afar, boosting the overall potential of defense system.
ie.manual.entry.emplacement_ir_observer2:
It is worth noticing the Infrared Observer can also detect Flares and send their coordinates, which can be used for directly guided precise artillery bombardment.
Observers have a limited field of view of 180 degrees, with no ability to turn around once set up and only up and down elevation being possible. This means, one Observer can only cover direction. Observers can turn when a proper data packet is sent to it, take note this requires disassembly and hiding into the emplacement.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_production.name: Bullet Production
ie.manual.entry.bullet_production.subtex: It's a shell, not a pencil!
ie.manual.entry.bullet_production0: To produce ammunition 2 parts are needed: the core - a container for explosives, shrapnel and other components and the casing - into which the core is put. Production of these parts consists of multiple steps and differs depending on type and complexity of your ammunition.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_production1:
Let’s start with the casing. Most casings can be produced using an appropriate mold in the , but some, like the , require crafting.
If you’re producing bullets, the next step is using the to fill the bullet casing with gunpowder. The casing is now finished and ready for the assembly.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_production2:
The core can be produced in the using metal nuggets, remember to use the : uranium has a better penetration value, but smaller component effect than brass. Another modifier you can pick is the , which determines how many components the core can store.
After your core is produced, you can fill it with components using another projectile workshop with a filler upgrade installed. This step is optional and can be repeated multiple times with the same or different components.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_production3:
The final stage is the bullet assembly in the . Here you can select the . Keep in mind not all fuse types are supported by certain ammunition like grenades and explosives.
There is also a next, optional stage - the Chemical Painter. Ammunition can be painted for easier identification and higher uniformity.
ie.manual.entry.ammunition_workshop.name: Ammunition Workshop
ie.manual.entry.ammunition_workshop0: Ammunition workshop performs the final part of the <link;bullet_production;§o§nammunition §o§nproduction§r;> - the assembly. To form it use a hammer on the steel scaffolding block between two conveyors.
ie.manual.entry.ammunition_workshop1: Ammunition workshop assembles ammunition from a core produced in the <link;projectile_workshop;§o§nProjectile §o§nWorkshop§r;> and a casing. It also sets the fuse determining under what conditions its components will detonate. Fuses can be set through the interface or a data packet. To operate, the machine requires electricity.
ie.manual.entry.projectile_workshop.name: Projectile Workshop
ie.manual.entry.projectile_workshop0: The Projectile Workshop is a machine used to manufacture or fill cores - the projectile parts of bullets with components. To form it use a hammer on the left metal crate.
ie.manual.entry.projectile_workshop1: In default configuration, the projectile workshop produces <link;bullet_cores;§o§ncores §o§nfrom §o§nmetal §o§nnuggets§r;>. To operate the machine requires electricity. Trough its interface the produced ammunition and core type can be set. It is also possible to do so using the data system.
ie.manual.entry.projectile_workshop2: The Projectile Workshop can be upgraded to become a Projectile Filler. This changes the role to filling cores produced by other Projectile Workshops using <link;bullet_components;§o§nComponents§r;>. An amount to be filled can be specified using the interface or trough the data system. The max amount is determined by the core type.
ie.manual.entry.fortifications.name: Field Defenses
ie.manual.entry.fortifications0: Sandbags are a cheap protective wall, resistant to small caliber bullets and small explosions. They are very useful in building trenches and are used to create <link;emplacement;§o§nemplacements§r;>.
ie.manual.entry.fortifications1: The Anti-Tank Trap, also called an Anti-Tank Hedgehog is a passive anti-vehicle weapon. Its sharp edges are capable of cutting trough tracks and tires of vehicles and severely damaging light vehicles attempting to ram them.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_component.propaga: He who obeys, does not listen to himself!
Propaganda can be used to instill fear in your enemies, that is if they can read, obviously.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_component.tesla.d: Discharge emitters create a field which disrupts the flow of electricity. They are useful in disabling industrial equipment, emplacements and sabotaging energy production.
ie.manual.entry.bullet_component.shrapne: Thorium is a good, but costly shrapnel material with high damage and penetration values.
ie.manual.entry.task_system.name: Task System
ie.manual.entry.task_system0:
Task System is a concept of organising a machine’s work schedule through single, iterable tasks. Tasks are used by many data devices, such as the inserters, the packer and the data router.
Tasks are divided into:
Jobs - tasks which will execute infinitely, unless manually removed
Requests - tasks, which are temporary and will remove after they are finished (i.e. after an inserter picks a certain amount of items)
ie.manual.entry.task_system1: By default, tasks are executed from the oldest to the newest. If a task cannot be executed, it will be skipped. After finishing a Request (successfully or not), it’s checked whether it should be removed.
ie.manual.entry.packer2: The "Pack" task is used to load items into the container. By default the packer can take any item (the * symbol) and the maximum possible amount of it. This can be changed: by selecting a different mode you can choose between taking in amount of slots or items. This amount can be specified in the interface, through the input field below.
ie.manual.entry.packer3: The "Uses OreDict" switch determines whether items with the same Ore Dictionary key will be matched. This allows, i.e. to take different types of stone or wooden planks. The "NBT Sensitive" switch determines whether the item has to have the same NBT tag as the one inputted. It is disabled by default.
ie.manual.entry.packer4: The "Unpack", "Fill", "Unfill", "Charge" and "Discharge" tasks work in similar way as the "Pack" task. For fluids, "slots" are tanks and amount is the fluid amount in mB. For energy, only the amount is taken into consideration.
ie.manual.entry.packer.vars_in.s.sub: Optional. The ItemStack or OreDict String the items have to match.
ie.manual.entry.packer.vars_in.e.sub: Optional. After what amount should the task end.
ie.manual.entry.advanced_powerpack.name: Improved Capacitor Backpack
ie.manual.entry.advanced_powerpack0: Improved Capacitor Backpack is a direct upgrade to the <link;powerpack0;§o§nCapacitor §o§nBackpack§r;>, with the main difference being more energy capacity and ability to be charged by <link;teslaCoil;§o§nTesla §o§nCoils§r;>.
ie.manual.entry.advanced_powerpack1: Its wireless charging ability also makes the wearer immune to electric damage and removes the need of wearing the Faraday Suit. The Backpack's side sacks can be painted the same way as leather armor.
ie.manual.entry.medicrate.name: Medical Crate
ie.manual.entry.medicrate0: The Medical Crate is a device used for healing wounded entities. After being placed it has to be filled with §lbasic§r Regeneration Potions to work.
ie.manual.entry.medicrate1: Sneaking and right clicking will open or close the crate: when it's closed - its inventory can be accessed, when it's open - right click to receive the effects. The Medical Crate can also apply an "Iron Will" boost effect, increasing mobility and focus while firing weapons on the move called. To gain it, the second slot has to be filled with Golden Apples.
ie.manual.entry.medicrate2: An inserter can be installed on top of the crate. To do it, use the wrench on a closed crate and select the appropriate upgrade. After being installed, the crate requires a MV or LV power wire connected directly to it. The installed syringe inserter will automatically heal and give boost to entities around.
ie.manual.entry.repair_crate.name: Repair Crate
ie.manual.entry.repair_crate.subtext: Approved by Ministry of Nuts and Bolts
ie.manual.entry.repair_crate0: The Repair Crate is a device used for repairing equipped items and if upgraded - nearby vehicles. After being placed it has to be supplied with steel plates to work.
ie.manual.entry.repair_crate1: Sneaking and right clicking will open or close the crate: when it's closed - its inventory can be accessed, when it's open - right click to receive the effects. The Repair Crate will repair all items held and worn by the user.
ie.manual.entry.repair_crate2: An inserter can be installed on top of the crate. To do it, use the wrench on a closed crate and select the appropriate upgrade. After being installed, the crate requires a MV or LV power wire connected directly to it. The installed welder inserter will automatically repair equipped items, vehicles and blocks around.
ie.manual.entry.motorworks.name: Motorworks
ie.manual.entry.motorworks: Motorworks is a branch of engineering focused on construction of vehicles, enhancing the performance of other tasks. Vehicles increase speed of transportation of personnel and goods, and by that improve the overall efficiency of your factory. Vehicles can also be utilised to gain advantage in combat.
ie.manual.entry.rubber_production.name: Rubber Production
ie.manual.entry.rubber_production0: The first step in rubber production is finding and gathering saplings of the §6Rubber Trees§r found in the jungle biome. These trees are a valuable source of latex - a white fluid, which is the main component of industrial rubber.
ie.manual.entry.rubber_production1: The second step is creating a rubber plantation, when the tree saplings are grown, carve the extraction hole log using an axe. Then place a latex collector next to the tree and use a bucket on a collector to make it gather latex.
ie.manual.entry.rubber_production2:
If more than one collector is next to the tree, the latex will be split between all of them. When the bucket is full, interact with the collector to regain it.
To start coagulating latex into raw rubber two things are needed: §6formic acid§r and . To produce formic acid a is required. Combine Carbon Monoxide with Methanol to gain Formic Acid.
ie.manual.entry.rubber_production3: Carbon monoxide can be produced through electrolysis of carbon dioxide, a pollutant and byproduct collected by the §6Carbon Dioxide Filter§r.
ie.manual.entry.rubber_production4: Methanol can be produced by mixing nickel or platinum with hydrogen, created through electrolysis of water. The last step is to combine both using the <link;refinery;§o§nrefinery§r;>.
ie.manual.entry.rubber_production5: When latex and formic acid are acquired, it's time for some coagulation. Use the machine to create §6raw rubber§r balls and then press them into sheets using a plate mold in the <link;metalPress;§o§nmetal §o§npress§r;>.
ie.manual.entry.rubber_production6: The last step is vulcanization of raw rubber sheets. Use the <link;vulcanizer;§o§nVulcanizer§r;> to produce rubber tires or belts.
ie.manual.entry.vehicle_workshop.name: Vehicle Workshop
ie.manual.entry.vehicle_workshop0: Industrial progress brings new means of transportation, replacing traditional ones, like horses. The Vehicle Workshop enables you to create these new means, most notably - <link;motorbike;§o§nThe §o§nMotorbike§r;>. To form it, use a hammer on the left aluminium scaffolding.
ie.manual.entry.vehicle_workshop1: The machine requires <config;b;petroleumHere;§6Diesel§r or ;>§6Biodiesel§r along with electricity to run, these can be provided using the appropriate ports on machine's side and top. To create a vehicle - select an appropriate option through the interface, provide shown materials and make sure no vehicle is parked on the platform. If all the conditions are met, press the striped button in the interface and the workshop will start assembling your vehicle.
ie.manual.entry.vehicle_workshop2: If the vehicle uses fuel, it will be refueled half-way using the workshop's internal tank. The fuel will not last for long, so consider building a <link;§o§nFuel §o§nStation§r;fuel_station;>.
ie.manual.entry.vehicle_workshop3: Existing vehicles can also be upgraded. To apply an upgrade, drive your vehicle onto the platform and select valid upgrades through the interface. Upgrading and removing upgrades requires power and diesel to be supplied.
ie.manual.entry.fuel_station.name: Fuel Station
ie.manual.entry.fuel_station0: The Fuel Station is a device used for automatic refuel of vehicles nearby. To form it use a hammer on the left light engineering block.
ie.manual.entry.fuel_station1: The Fuel Station requires a supply of power to operate. The fuel needed depends on the vehicle, many vehicles, like motorbikes use diesel<config;b;petroleumHere;, but motorboats use gasoline;>.
ie.manual.entry.vulcanizer.name: Vulcanizer
ie.manual.entry.vulcanizer0: The Vulcanizer is the final machine in the <link;rubber_production;§o§nrubber §o§nproduction§r;> process. To form it use a hammer on the steel block nearest to the tank.
ie.manual.entry.vulcanizer1: Using heat, pressure, molds and set of additional compounds the Vulcanizer transforms raw rubber sheets into a familiar industrial rubber, which is used to construct many new machines, most notably faster conveyors, more efficient motor belts and is vital to wheeled vehicle production. To process rubber 3 ingredients are required: raw rubber sheets, provided to the upper port on the iron container, vulcanization compound - provided to the port below and sulfur - inputted into the steel tank.
ie.manual.entry.vulcanizer2: To operate the machine requires a vulcanizer mold - determining the final output and electricity.
ie.manual.entry.vulcanizer3: Vulcanizer molds can be created in the <link;workbench;§o§nEngineer's §o§nWorkbench§r;> using the blueprint above.
ie.manual.entry.vulcanizer4: The Vulcanization compound consists of additives which improve rubber's properties. It can be crafted using 2 ways.
ie.manual.entry.coagulator.name: Coagulator
ie.manual.entry.coagulator0: The coagulator is a machine used to coagulate latex and form raw rubber balls for further processing. To form it use a hammer on the middle sheetmetal block on machine's back.
ie.manual.entry.coagulator1: The coagulator requires a supply of electricity to its heavy connector port and a steady supply of latex (right tank) and formic acid (left tank), §ltake note the sides swap if the machine is flipped§r. After latex is mixed with the acid and the upper "quark" layer forms, the crane will pick one of the buckets, submerge it and put it back while a timer is automatically set. After some time, the latex will solidify into raw rubber, which will be outputted by a mechanism holding the bucket. The rubber will be dropped onto the ground next to the bucket.
ie.manual.entry.electric_tools.name: Powered Tools
ie.manual.entry.electric_tools0: The Engineer's Electric Hammer is a direct upgrade to the old Engineer's Hammer. Due to it's improved strength and speed, this hammer can form and construct Advanced Multiblocks, such as the <link;radio_station;§o§nRadio §o§nStation§r;>.
ie.manual.entry.electric_tools1: The Engineer's Electric Wrench is an enhanced version of the Engineer's Wrench. It constructs upgrades and emplacement weapons much faster than its manual counterpart.
ie.manual.entry.electric_tools2: The Engineer's Electric Wire Cutters are an improved version of the Engineer's Wire Cutters. They cut through blocks, such as razor wire faster.
ie.manual.entry.chain_fences.name: Chain Fences and Gates
ie.manual.entry.chain_fences0: The chain fences can serve as a stylish industrial-looking barrier between factory zones. They offer low amounts of protection against a full scale invasion, but are enough to deter unwanted guests from your base. Available in many flavours.
ie.manual.entry.chain_fences1: The Wooden Fence Gate makes for a stylish, monumental entry point to your factory complex. They can be activated using redstone on the inward side. Like fences, many flavours are available.
ie.manual.entry.chain_fences2: The Wooden Chain Fence Gate makes for a stylish, monumental entry point to your factory complex. They can be activated using redstone on the inward side. Like fences, many flavours are available.
ie.manual.entry.chain_fences3: The Steel Fence Gate makes for a stylish, monumental entry point to your factory complex. They can be activated using redstone on the inward side. Like fences, many flavours are available.
ie.manual.entry.chain_fences4: The Steel Chain Fence Gate makes for a stylish, monumental entry point to your factory complex. They can be activated using redstone on the inward side. Like fences, many flavours are available.
ie.manual.entry.chain_fences5: The Aluminium Fence Gate makes for a stylish, monumental entry point to your factory complex. They can be activated using redstone on the inward side. Like fences, many flavours are available.
ie.manual.entry.chain_fences6: The Aluminium Chain Fence Gate makes for a stylish, monumental entry point to your factory complex. They can be activated using redstone on the inward side. Like fences, many flavours are available.
death.attack.iiNuclearHeat: %1$s was decimated by a nuclear explosion
